|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR5112; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is equivalent to the [[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-4000]]. The default SSID for the 5GHz radio is '''My Wireless Network A'''. The default SSID for the 2.4GHz radio is '''My Wireless Network B'''. The power adapter included with the device is a '''DVE''' DSA-0151F-05 (5V, 2.8A). No firmware was found ==Links of Interest== [http://www.systimax.com/products/airspeed/documents/airspeed_installguide_ap542.pdf Install Guide]
